page.title: 13CLUBS
page.content: Although the village of Kilndown is very small, there are many organisations providing a range of activities. There follows a list with the meeting place of the organisation. 1. Angling Club Quarry Pond 2. Bell Ringers Church 3. Chess Club Village Hall 4. Choir Church 5. Cricket Club Club Ground 6. Fete Committee School Field 7. Horticultural Soc. Village Hall 8. Keep Fit Club Village Hall 9. Organ Fund Quarry House 10. P.C.C. School 11. Play Area Play Area 12. P.T.A. School 13. P.C.C. School 14. Quarry Centre Centre 15. Quarry Management Quarry 16. Royal British Legion Globe 17. Youth Club Village Hall
